39 #ifndef ASHTECHMBEN_HPP
40 #define ASHTECHMBEN_HPP
41 
47 #include <map>
48 #include <iostream>
49 #include <cmath>
50 #include "AshtechData.hpp"
51 
52 namespace gpstk
53 {
54  class AshtechMBEN : public AshtechData
55  {
56  public:
57 
58  AshtechMBEN() {};
59 
60  std::string header; // 11 characters exactly
61  unsigned seq; // sow in units of 50 ms, modulo 36,000
62  // (36,000 * 50 ms = 30 minutes)
63  unsigned left;
64  unsigned svprn; // the PRN of the tracked satellite
65  unsigned el; // degrees
66  unsigned az; // degrees
67  unsigned chid; // 1..12
68 
69  struct code_block
70  {
71  // Warning flag, a bit packed field
72  // bits 1&2: 0 same as goodbad=22, 1 same as goodbad=23,
73  // 3 same as goodbad=24
74  // bit 3: carrier phase questionable
75  // bit 4: code phase questionable
76  // bit 5: code phase integration not stable
77  // bit 6: Z tracking mode
78  // bit 7: possible lock of lock
79  // bit 8: loss of lock counter reset
80  unsigned warning;
81  // Measurement quality
82  // 0: measurement not available
83  // 22: code and or carrier phase measured
84  // P mode tracking on Z(Y)-12 units
85  // 23: 22 + nav msg obtained + obs NOT used in PVT computation
86  // 24: 22 + nav msg obtained + obs used in PVT computation
87  // Y mode tracking on Z(Y)-12 units
88  // 25: Z mode tracking on Z(Y)-12 units
89  unsigned goodbad;
90  unsigned polarity_known; // 'spare' in the ashtech docs
91  unsigned ireg; // SNR in custom units
92  unsigned qa_phase; // phase quality 0..5 and 95..100 are good
93  double full_phase; // cycles
94  double raw_range; // seconds
95  double doppler; // Hz
96  double smoothing; // meters
97  unsigned smooth_cnt; //
98 
99  virtual void decodeASCII(std::stringstream& str)
100  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError);
101  virtual void decodeBIN(std::string& str)
102  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError);
103  float snr(float chipRate) const throw();
104  void dump(std::ostream& out) const;
105  };
106 
107  // The remaining block is repeated repeated three times for an MPC but
108  // only appears once for an MCA
109  code_block ca;
110  code_block p1;
111  code_block p2;
112 
113  static const char *mpcId, *mcaId;
114 
115  virtual std::string getName() const {return "mben";}
116 
117  virtual bool checkId(std::string hdrId) const
118  {return hdrId==mpcId || hdrId==mcaId;}
119 
120  void dump(std::ostream& out) const throw();
121  virtual void decode(const std::string& data)
122  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError);
123 
124  protected:
125  virtual void reallyGetRecord(FFStream& ffs)
126  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError, EndOfFile);
127  };
128 } // namespace gpstk
129 
130 #endif
